ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( or(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Propose to Close')) , ISPICKVAL( Origin,'Phone'), ISPICKVAL(FCR__c ,''), $RecordType.Name == 'Technical Issue', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator',$Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)' , $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
